ygData.subject: RE: Blued 2H Hammer
ygData.msgSnippet: I know for a *fact* that this weapon was around during beta...but I have *heard* that it was removed from the game in final production. Sorry! ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
I know for a *fact* that this weapon was around during beta...but I have
*heard* that it was removed from the game in final production.
Sorry!

-----Original Message-----
From: Thulgar [mailto:thulgar@...]
Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 4:13 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Blued 2H Hammer


I just saw this on EQ'lizer, I don't know if anyone has talked about this at
all, but here's the
info on it

MAGIC ITEM LORE ITEM
Blued 2H Hammer
Race: = all
Class: = WAR, CLR, SHD, SHM, DRU, MNK
Skill: = 2H Blunt
WT: = 13.0
DMG: = 21
Delay: = 45
Special: = Project Lighting *no charges showen or needed*

I would LOVE all info anyone has , that's *FACT* on this weapon, where it is
located, etc or how to
do it if it's a quest item. I would love to find this and get this, please
send me info.

Thulgar
